```{r}
#uploading indometh dataset
install.packages("medicaldata")
library(medicaldata)
data(package="medicaldata")
covid <- medicaldata::covid_testing
class(covid)
covid <- as.data.frame(covid)



```

```{r}
library(gtsummary)
library(dplyr)

covid <- covid %>%
  mutate(orderset = recode(orderset,
                      `0` = "No",
                      `1` = "Yes"),
    drive_thru_ind = recode(drive_thru_ind,
                            `0` = "No",
                            `1` = "Yes"))
 



tbl_summary(data=covid,
						by=gender,
						include=c(pan_day, test_id, clinic_name,result, demo_group, age,drive_thru_ind,ct_result, orderset,payor_group, patient_class, col_rec_tat, rec_ver_tat),
	label = list(pan_day ~ "# of days tested after pandemic start",
							 test_id ~ "type of test",
							 clinic_name ~ "clinic",
							 demo_group ~ "subject groups",
							 drive_thru_ind ~ "Collected at a drive-thru site?",
							 ct_result ~ "PCR threshold", orderset~"Collected via orderset?", 
							 patient_class ~ "subject disposition", 
							 col_rec_tat ~ "Time elapsed on collection and receive", 
							 rec_ver_tat ~ "Time elapsed on receive and verification"))

 
```
